Package io.permazen.annotation

Annotations used for automatic creation of a Permazen and corresponding schema configuration of the underlying Database from annotated classes, as well as automatic registration of various listeners, etc.

See: Description

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    FollowPath
    Java annotation for declaring methods that should return objects found by traversing a ReferencePath.
    JCompositeIndex
    Java annotation defining a composite index on all PermazenType-annotated sub-types.
    JCompositeIndexes
    Container for the @Repeatable annotation JCompositeIndex.
    JField
    Java annotation for defining simple fields, including reference fields that refer to other Java model object types, and Counter fields.
    JFieldType
    Java annotation for classes that define custom FieldTypes for a Permazen's underlying Database.
    JListField
    Java annotation for the getter methods of Java bean properties reflecting List fields.
    JMapField
    Java annotation for the getter methods of Java bean properties reflecting Permazen Map fields.
    JSetField
    Java annotation for the getter methods of Java bean properties reflecting Permazen Set fields.
    JTransient
    Eliminates the annotated method from consideration for Permazen field auto-generation.
    OnChange
    Annotation for methods that are to be invoked whenever a simple or complext target field in some target object changes during a transaction, where the target object containing the changed field is found at the end of a path of references starting from the object to be notified.
    OnCreate
    Annotates Permazen model class methods that are to be invoked whenever a database object is newly created.
    OnDelete
    Annotates Permazen model class methods that are to be invoked whenever an object is about to be deleted.
    OnValidate
    Annotates a Permazen model class method that should be invoked any time the associated model object is validated.
    OnVersionChange
    Annotation for methods that are to be invoked whenever an object's schema version has just changed.
    PermazenType
    Java annotation for Java classes that are Permazen object model types.

Package io.permazen.annotation Description

Annotations used for automatic creation of a Permazen and corresponding schema configuration of the underlying Database from annotated classes, as well as automatic registration of various listeners, etc.

All Permazen annotations may be configured indirectly as a Spring meta-annotation when spring-core is on the classpath.
